All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Die
Represents a die object, but there's not much code here as all die-rolling logic is handled by GameBoard
GameBoard
The physical game board for Connor Floyd's "The Royal Echoes of Ur" game (NOTE: this class is also used as a "level manager" for managing the game logic, game state, etc.)
GameManager
Write a description of class GameManager here.
PlayerPiece
Represents a player's game piece -- player 1's pieces (for player index 0) are straight-faced, player 2's pieces (for player index 1) are smiling
Space
Represents a GameBoard space and its associated attributes (i.e., is it a safe space or not, is it occupied by a given player's piece or not, etc.)
Tile
Tile object that makes up the background tiles and supplementary tiles on the GameBoard, taking a number in initialization to decide which image will be used.
TitleScreen
Write a description of class TitleScreen here.
